dublin_core.dcvalue: Assisting diabetes patients to self manage blood glucose test and insulin injection is of great importance for their healthcare This study presented a PDA based system to manage the personal glucose level data interfaced with a small glucometer through a serial port The data stored in the PDA can be transmitted by cradle or wireless communication to the remote web server where further medical analysis and service is provided This system enables more efficient and systematic management of diabetes patients through self management and remote medical practice
Studies in health technology and informatics
Personal diabetes management system based on ubiquitous computing technology.
